name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【おおきにアリーナ舞洲】 [Q1s4w-_ujig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A video montage featuring fan messages (yosegaki) for Hoshimachi Suisei's tour, followed by concert attendance rules and merchandise announcements.

subtitles.original:
HOSHIMACHI SUISEI LIVE TOUR 2024 "SPECTRA of NOVA"
ファンメッセージ 寄せ書き

HOSHIMACHI SUISEI LIVE TOUR 2024 "SPECTRA of NOVA"

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 受注生産グッズ 受付中
